tuv.seg: (If no corresponding current topic exists, use the <e1>NeedsUpdate</e1> tag, and add an explanation on the Talk page.) Pages with the Archive tag are eventually moved from the main content of MDN to the <a2>Archive</a2> section.
（如果没有相应的当前主题存在，用上 <e1>NeedsUpdate</e1> 标签，并且在Talk页面上添加一个说明。）具有 Archive 标签的页面最终将从 MDN 主内容区移动到<a2>归档</a2>区。
... left column contents ...
... 左栏内容 ...
... right column contents ...
... 右栏内容 ...

<<<一旦我们完成着陆页标准之后就会来写完这些>>>
<a0>Commonly-used macros</a0> on MDN, with explanations.
MDN <a0>常用宏</a0>，带有解说。
<a0>JavaScript/Guide</a0> - Main table-of-contents page
<a0>JavaScript/Guide</a0> - 主目录页
<e0>Archive</e0>: Use for content that is technically superseded and no longer useful.
<e0>Archive（归档）</e0>：对技术上已被取代且不再有用的内容使用此标签。
<e0>Junk</e0>: Use for spam, pages created by mistake, or content that is so bad that it should be deleted.
<e0>Junk（垃圾）</e0>：对垃圾页面使用此标签。页面是错误创建的，或内容实在太差而应当删除。
<e0>Obsolete</e0>: Use for content that is technically superseded, but still valid in context.
<e0>Obsolete（过时）</e0>：对技术上已被取代、但仍在特定上下文中有用的内容使用此标签。
<f0><s1>Correct</s1></f0>: email, re-elect, co-op
<f0><s1>正确</s1></f0>：email, re-elect, co-op
<f0><s1>Incorrect</s1></f0>: e-mail, reelect, coop
<f0><s1>错误</s1></f0>：e-mail, reelect, coop

<s0><s1>Cascading Style Sheets</s1>, most of the time abbreviated as <s2>CSS</s2>, is a <a3>stylesheet</a3> language used to describe the presentation of a document written in <a4>HTML</a4></s0> or <a5>XML</a5> (including various XML languages like <a6>SVG</a6> or <a7>XHTML</a7>).
<s0><s1>级联样式表(Cascading Style Sheets)</s1>,，通常缩写为 <s2>CSS</s2>，是一种<a3>样式表</a3>语言，用于描述用<a4>HTML</a4></s0>、<a5>XML</a5>（包括诸如 <a6>SVG</a6> 或 <a7>XHTML</a7>的各种 XML 语言）所编写文档的呈现。.
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: "A new method for creating JavaScript rollovers"
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>："A new method for creating JavaScript rollovers"
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: "XUL (XML User Interface Language) is Mozilla's XML-based language..."
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>："XUL (XML User Interface Language) is Mozilla's XML-based language..."
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: ... web browsers, and so on.
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>：... web browsers, and so on.
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: 486s
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: CD-ROMs
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>：CD-ROMs
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: Click the Edit button.
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>：点击编辑按钮。
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: February 24, 2006
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: I will travel on trains, planes, and automobiles.
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>：I will travel on trains, planes, and automobiles.
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: Web browsers (e.g. Firefox) can be used ...
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>：Web browsers (e.g. Firefox) can be used ...
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: Web browsers such as Firefox can be used ...
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>： Web browsers such as Firefox can be used ...
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: XUL
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: localize, honor
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>：localize, honor
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: syllabuses, octopuses
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>：syllabuses, octopuses
<s0><s1>Correct</s1></s0>: the {{HTMLElement("span")}} element
<s0><s1>正确</s1></s0>：{{HTMLElement("span")}} 元素
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: "A New Method for Creating JavaScript Rollovers"
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>："A New Method for Creating JavaScript Rollovers"
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: "XUL is Mozilla's XML-based language..."
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>："XUL is Mozilla's XML-based language..."
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: ... web browsers, etc.
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：... web browsers, etc.
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: 1990's
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: 486's
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: CD-ROM's
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：CD-ROM's
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: Click Edit.
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: February 24th, 2006; 24 February, 2006; 24/02/2006
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: I will travel on trains, planes and automobiles.
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：I will travel on trains, planes and automobiles.
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: Web browsers e.g. Firefox can be used ...
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：Web browsers e.g. Firefox can be used ...
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: Web browsers, (eg: Firefox) can be used ...
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：Web browsers, (eg: Firefox) can be used ...
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: Web browsers, e.g. Firefox, can be used ...
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：Web browsers, e.g. Firefox, can be used ...
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: X.U.L.; Xul
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: localise, honour
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：localise, honour
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: syllabi, octopi
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：syllabi, octopi
<s0><s1>Incorrect</s1></s0>: the span tag
<s0><s1>错误</s1></s0>：span 标签
<s0>CSS Flexible Box Layout</s0> is a module of CSS that defines a multi-column layout, allowing to express how content should flow between columns, and how gaps and rules are handled.
<s0>CSS 弹性框布局</s0> 是定义多栏布局的 CSS 模块，可以表述内容应当如何在各栏之间流动，以及栏间距与规则应当如何处理。
<s0>CSS</s0> is one of the core languages of the <e1>open web</e1> and has a standardized <a2>W3C specification</a2>.
<s0>CSS</s0> 是<e1>开放网络(open web)</e1>的核心语言之一，拥有标准化的 <a2>W3C 规范</a2>。
<s0>Landing pages</s0> are pages at the root of a topic area of the site, such as the main <a1>CSS</a1> or <a2>HTML</a2> pages.
<s0>着陆页</s0>是指站点中位于主题区域根源位置的页面，诸如 <a1>CSS</a1> 或 <a2>HTML</a2> 的主页面。

<s0>Note:</s0> Though <a1>CSS Flexible Boxes Layout specification</a1> is at the Last Call Working Draft stage (see also the <a2>Latest Editor draft</a2>), not all browsers have implemented all features of Flexbox.
<s0>注意：</s0> 虽然 <a1>CSS 弹性框布局规范</a1> 还处于最终征求意见稿 (Last Call Working Draft)阶段（参见<a2>最新编辑草案</a2>），并非所有浏览器都实现了弹性框的所有功能。

<s0>The CSS3 <s1>Flexible Box</s1>, or <s2>flexbox</s2>, is a <a3>layout mode</a3> providing for the arrangement of elements on a page such that the elements behave predictably when the page layout must accommodate different screen sizes and different display devices.</s0> For many applications, the flexible box model provides an improvement over the block model in that it does not use floats, nor do the flex container's margins collapse with the margins of its contents.
<s0>CSS3 弹性框(<s1>Flexible Box</s1> 或 <s2>flexbox</s2>)，是一种当页面需要适应不同的屏幕大小以及设备类型时确保元素拥有恰当排布行为的<a3>布局方式</a3>。</s0>对很多应用而言，由于不使用浮动，且弹性容器的外边距也不会与其内容的外边距合并，弹性框模型比起方框模型要好一些。
<s0>To present documentation in an organized, standardized and easy-to-read manner, the Mozilla Developer Network style guide describes how a text should be organized, spelled, formatted, and so on.
<s0>MDN 样式指南描述了文本的组织方式、拼写和格式等问题，以求能以一种有组织、标准化且易于阅读的方式呈现文档。

<s0>To present documentation in an organized, standardized and easy-to-read manner, the Mozilla Developer Network style guide describes how a text should be organized, spelled, formatted, and so on. These are guidelines rather than strict rules.</s0> We are more interested in content than formatting, so don't feel obligated to learn the style guide before contributing. Do not be upset or surprised, however, if an industrious volunteer later edits your work to conform to this guide.

<s0>To present documentation in an organized, standardized and easy-to-read manner, the Mozilla Developer Network style guide describes how a text should be organized, spelled, formatted, and so on. These are guidelines rather than strict rules.</s0> We are more interested in content than formatting, so don't feel obligated to learn the style guide before contributing. Do not be upset or surprised, however, if an industrious volunteer later edits your work to conform to this guide.
<s0>Use the serial comma</s0>.
<s0>使用系列逗号</s0>。
A <a0>collection of demos</a0> showing the latest CSS technologies in action: a boost for the creativity.
此<a0>演示汇集</a0>以实际行动展示最新的 CSS 技术：为创新加油！
A <a0>step-by-step introduction</a0> to help complete beginners get started.
面向完全新手的<a0>入门教程</a0>，助其上手。
A brief (typically one paragraph) overview of what the technology is and how it's used.
简短（通常是一个段落）的概述，说明技术是什么以及如何使用它。
A confirmation dialog appears, asking the user if he allows the Web page to make use of his Web cam.
弹出对话框来询问用户是否允许网页使用他的(his)摄像头。
A confirmation dialog appears, asking the user if he or she allows the web page to make use of his/her Web cam.
弹出对话框来询问用户是否允许网页使用他的/她的(his/her)摄像头。
A confirmation dialog appears, asking the user if she allows the Web page to make use of her Web cam.
弹出对话框来询问用户是否允许网页使用她的(her)摄像头。
A confirmation dialog appears, asking the user if they allow the Web page to make use of their Web cam.
弹出对话框来询问用户是否允许网页使用其(their)摄像头。
A confirmation dialog appears, asking the users if they allow the Web page to make use of their Web cams.
弹出对话框来询问用户们(users)是否允许网页使用他们的(their)摄像头。
A confirmation dialog appears, requesting the user's permission for Web cam access.
弹出对话框来请求用户给予使用摄像头的权限。
A confirmation dialog box appears, which asks the user for permission to use the Web cam.
弹出请求用户给予使用摄像头的权限的对话框。
A list of links to landing pages for other, related, technologies of relevance.
通往其他相关技术的着陆页的链接列表。
A list of tools the user can look at to help with the use of the technology described in this section of MDN.
能够帮助用户使用在 MDN 此区域中所描述技术的工具列表。
A two-column list of links with appropriate headings.
带有恰当标题的两栏链接列表。
Abbrev
缩写
Acronyms and abbreviations
首字母缩略词与缩写

Also, at least the first time you reference a given element in a section should use the {{TemplateLink("HTMLElement")}} macro, to create a link to the documentation for the element (unless you're writing within that element's reference document page).
同样，至少每个章节中对特定元素的第一次引用应当使用 {{TemplateLink("HTMLElement")}} 宏，来建立通向此元素文档的链接（除非刚好是在编写此元素的参考文档页）。
Alternately, you can use the YYYY/MM/DD format.
也可以用 YYYY/MM/DD 的格式。
Always consider whether it's truly beneficial to use a Latin abbreviation.
任何时候都要考虑一下用拉丁缩写是不是真的有收益。
An <a0>exhaustive reference</a0> for seasoned Web developers describing every property and concept of CSS.
面向资深 Web 开发者的<a0>全面参考</a0>，描述了 CSS 的各个属性与该念。
An <s0>optional</s0> "Browser compatibility" section at the bottom of the page.
<s0>可选的</s0>“浏览器兼容性”区段，出现在页面底部。
And be sure that <s0>you</s0> use them correctly, if you choose to do so.
假如选择使用拉丁缩写，请确保<s0>你自己</s0>没有用错。
Aside from looking horrible, it's helpful to readers if every heading has at least a brief intro after it to introduce the subsections beneath.
这样看起来很糟糕，并且对于读者来说，在每个标题后都至少有段介绍子章节的简介会很有帮助。
Attach the desired image file to the article (at the bottom of every article in edit mode)
将想要的图像文件附加到文章（编辑模式下在文章底部）
Attribute definitions
属性定义
Attribute names
属性名
Attribute values
属性值
Basic support
基础支持
Basics
基本原则
Below that is a
在它之下是文章的
Below that is a <c1><dl></c1> list of articles with each article's link in a <c2><dt></c2> block and a brief one-or-two sentence summary of the article in the corresponding <c3><dd></c3> block.
接下来是一个文章的 <c1><dl></c1> 列表，每篇文章的链接在 <c2><dt></c2> 块中，文章的一两句简短摘要则出现在相应的 <c3><dd></c3> 块。
Below you'll find some basic information, but you can find a complete guide to <a0>creating and editing links on MDN</a0> in our editor guide.
下面是一些基本信息，在我们的编辑指南中的<a0>在 MDN 创建与编辑链接</a0>处有完整的指南。
Both versions are gender-specific.
这两个版本都是限定性别的。
Box model
方框模型(box model)
Browser compatibility
浏览器兼容性
By default, the first paragraph of the page is used as the SEO summary.
默认情况下，页面的第一个段落将作为 SEO 摘要。
CSS Properties
CSS 属性
CSS Reference
CSS 参考
CSS Tutorial
CSS 教程
CSS describes how the structured element must be rendered on screen, on paper, in speech, or on other media.
CSS 描述了在屏幕、纸面、语音或其它媒体上，结构化元素要如何渲染。
CSS key concepts
CSS 关键概念
CSS3 Demos
CSS3 演示
Capitalization
大小写
Capitalization and periods
大写与句点
Child elements in a flexbox can be laid out in any direction and can have flexible dimensions to adapt to the display space.
弹性框中的子元素可以在各个方向上进行布局，并且能以弹性尺寸来适应显示空间。
Choosing titles and slugs
选择标题与缩略名(slug)
Click the "pre" button in the toolbar to create the preformatted content box in which you'll then write your code.
点击工具栏上的 "pre" 按钮来创建预格式化的内容框，随后在其中写下代码。
Code sample style and formatting
示例代码的样式与格式
Commas
逗号
Comment
注解
Common Latin abbreviations (etc., i.e., e.g.) may be used in parenthetical expressions and notes.
常见的拉丁缩写(etc., i.e., e.g.)可用于括号表达或注解中。
Contractions
缩略
Create an image in the WYSIWYG editor
在所见即所得编辑器中建立图像
Creating a page link list
建立页面链接列表
Creating new subtrees
创建新子树
Dates
日期
Decades
年代
Deprecated:
废弃(deprecated)：
Developed in levels, CSS1 is now obsolete, CSS2.1 is a recommendation, and <a3>CSS3</a3>, now split into smaller modules, is progressing on the standardization track.
CSS的发展分为多个级别，CSS1 现已过时，CSS2.1 是推荐标准，<a3>CSS3</a3>现在划分为多个小模块，正在标准化的进程中。
Do not be upset or surprised, however, if an industrious volunteer later edits your work to conform to this guide.
不过，稍后可能会有勤劳的志愿者修改你的作品，以求符合本指南，碰到这种情况时无需惊讶，也别沮丧。
Do not use variant spellings.
不要使用变体拼写。
Documentation and tutorials
文档与教程
Don't create single subsections -- you don't subdivide a topic into one.
不要建立单一的子章节——你并不会把一个主题细分为一部分。
Don't have bumping heads, which are headings followed immediately by headings.
避免在标题后面紧跟另一个标题。
Don't use an apostrophe.
不要用撇号(')。
E.g.: When the <s0>type</s0> attribute of an <c1><i2></c1> element is set to <c3>email</c3> or <c4>tel</c4> ...
例如：当 <c1><i2></c1> 元素的 <s0>type</s0> 属性设为 <c3>email</c3> 或 <c4>tel</c4> 时……
Each article may have as many tags as needed.
如有需要，每篇文章可以拥有任意数量标签。
Element names
元素名
English
英语
Entire lines (or multiple lines) of code should be formatted using syntax highlighting rather than the {{HTMLElement("code")}} element.
整行（或多行）代码应当用语法高亮来格式化，而非 {{HTMLElement("code")}} 元素。
Ever.
绝对不要。
Every page in the wiki should have tags.
在 wiki 上的每个页面都应当有标签。
Expansion
展开形式
External links
外部链接
Feature
特性
Feel free to update them as needed if you like.
只要你愿意，随时可以对它们进行必要的更新。
Flexible boxes concept
弹性框概念
For Mozilla-specific technologies, the API is no longer implemented in Mozilla code; for Web standard technology, the API or feature is no longer supported by current, commonly-used browsers.
对于 Mozilla 专有技术，API 在 Mozilla 代码中不再有所实现；对于 Web 标准技术，API 或特性在当前常见通用浏览器中不再受支持。

For Mozilla-specific technologies, the API is still supported in Mozilla code; for Web standard technology, the API or feature has been removed or replaced in a recent version of the defining standard.
对于 Mozilla 专有技术，API 在 Mozilla 代码中仍然有所支持；对于 Web 标准技术，API 或特性在最近一个版本的标准定义中有所删改。
For WebKit bugs, you can use this macro:
对于 WebKit bug，用这个宏：
For dates (not including dates in code samples) use the format "January 1, 1990".
对于日期（不包括示例代码中的日期）使用"January 1, 1990"的格式。
For decades, use the format "1990s".
对于年代，用"1990s"的格式。
For example an HTML element that is obsolete in HTML5 is still valid in HTML 4.01.
例如，在 HTML5 中已过时但在 HTML4.01 中仍有效的 HTML 元素。
For example, "Enter" not "ENTER."
例如，"Enter"而非"ENTER"。
For example, "the <c0>frenchText()</c0> function".
例如，“<c0>frenchText()</c0> 函数”
For example, a page that describes how to use the Mozilla CVS repository should refer readers to a current topic on using Mercurial repos.
例如，描述如何使用 Mozilla CVS 仓库的页面应当将读者导向当前关于使用 Mercurial repos 的主题。
For example, an article about using JavaScript in AJAX programming might have both "JavaScript" and "AJAX" as tags.
例如，一篇关于在 AJAX 编程中JavaScript 的使用的文章可以同时用"JavaScript"和"AJAX"作为标签。
For example, be careful not to confuse "e.g." with "i.e.", which is a common error.
例如，一个常见的错误是把"e.g."与"i.e."混淆。
For example, consider the <a0>JavaScript</a0> guide, which is structured as follows:
以 <a0>JavaScript</a0> 指南为例，它的结构如下：
For example, use them next to the bold attribute name but not for every occurrence in your body text.
例如，将其用在加粗的属性名旁边，但并不是在正文中每次出现加粗的属性名时都用。
For example, writing \{{HTMLElement("title")}} produces "{{HTMLElement("title")}}".
例如，写下 \{{HTMLElement("title")}} 将生成 "{{HTMLElement("title")}}"。
For example:
例如：
For plurals of acronyms or abbreviations, add <e0>s</e0>.
对于首字母缩略词与缩写的复数情况，在后面加<e0>s</e0>。
For plurals of numerals add "s".
对于数词的复数情况，在后面加"s"。
For questions of spelling, please refer to <a0>Dictionary.com</a0>.
拼写问题请参考<a0>Dictionary.com</a0>。
For security reasons, you should only create links that use the following schemes:
由于安全方面的原因，应当只创建使用以下 scheme 的链接：
For style standards that apply to content written for sites other than MDN, refer to the <a0>One Mozilla style guide</a0>.
为 MDN 以外的站点所写的内容，其应用的样式标准可参考 <a0>一体化 Mozilla 样式指南</a0>.
For words with variant spellings, always use the first entry at <a0>Dictionary.com</a0>.
存在多种拼写法的单词，以<a0>Dictionary.com</a0>上第一个条目的写法为准。
Gender-neutral language
中性语言
Getting help from the community
从社区获得帮助
Guides
指南
H2 is the highest level allowed because H1 is reserved for the page title.
允许使用的最高级别是 H2，因为 H1 要留给页面标题。
HTML elements
HTML 元素
However, you can override this behavior by marking a section with the <a0>"SEO summary" style in the WYSIWYG editor</a0>.
然而，可以通过对段落应用<a0>所见即所得编辑器中的“SEO 摘要”样式</a0>来覆盖此行为。
Hyphenate compounds when the last letter of the prefix is a vowel and is the same as the first letter of the root.
如果复合词的前缀部分最后一个字母是一个元音，且与字根的第一个字母一样，则需要断字。
Hyphenation
断字
Identify the user interface element by its label and type.
用户界面元素通过其标签(label)与类型来识别。
If no appropriate transformation is available, use the <c0>pre</c0> tag without specifying a language ("No Highlight" in the language menu).
如果没有合适的转化可用，那么用 <c0>pre</c0> 标记同时不指定任何语言（语言列表中的“不高亮”）。
If possible, add a note to the topic referring readers to a more current topic.
如果有可能，为此主题添加一个注解，将读者导向更新的主题。
If you can't do it using a predefined class, drop into {{IRCLink("mdn")}} and ask for help.
如果无法靠预定义类型搞定，请到 {{IRCLink("mdn")}} 寻求帮助。
If you don't want to create a link, <s0>enclose the name in angle brackets</s0> and use "Code (inline)" style (e.g.,
如果不想建立链接，<s0>用尖括号括住名称</s0>并使用“代码（内联）”样式（例如，
If you have questions about usage and style not covered here, we recommend referring to the <a0>Economist style guide</a0> or, failing that, the <a1>Chicago Manual of Style</a1>.
如果对这里未包含的用法与样式有疑问，推荐参考<a0>Economist style guide</a0>，或者，如果还是没找到，<a1>Chicago Manual of Style</a1>。

If you need more than three or four levels of headers you should consider breaking up the article into several smaller articles with a landing page, linking them together using the {{TemplateLink("Next")}}, {{TemplateLink("Previous")}}, and {{TemplateLink("PreviousNext")}} macros.
如果标题要超过三或四个级别，应当考虑将文章拆分成一系列更小的文章和相应的着陆页，通过 {{TemplateLink("Next")}}、{{TemplateLink("Previous")}} 和 {{TemplateLink("PreviousNext")}} 这几个宏将它们链接在一起。
If you're interested in improving your writing and editing skills, you may find the following resources to be helpful.
如果对改进写作与编辑能力有兴趣，以下资源对你可能有用。
If you're looking for specifics of how a given type of page should be structured, see the <a0>MDN page layout guide</a0>.
如果你正在寻找某种特定类型页面具体应当如何结构化，参见 <a0>页面布局指南</a0>。
In addition to using tags to track information about the documentation's quality and content, we also use them to mark articles as needing specific types of work.
除了用标签来跟踪有关文档质量和内容的信息，我们也用标签来将文章标记为需要特定类型的工作。
In addition, they should almost always be wrapped in "<>", and should be in the {{HTMLElement("code")}} style.
另外，基本上在所有情况下都应当在元素名外面加上"<>"，并且应当应用 {{HTMLElement("code")}} 样式。
In notes and parentheses
在注解和括号中
In particular, be sure not to use the <c0>about:</c0> or <c1>chrome://</c1> schemes, as they will not work.
尤其是，绝对不要用 <c0>about:</c0> 或 <c1>chrome://</c1> scheme，它们无法正常工作。
In regular text (i.e. text outside of notes or parentheses), use the English equivalent of the abbreviation.
在常规文本中 （即，注解与括号之外的文本），使用与这些缩写等价的英语表达。
In running text
在连续文本中
In running text, use commas only in five-digit and larger numbers.
在连续文本中，只有5位或者或者更多位的数字才加逗号分段。
In task sequences, describe user interface actions using the imperative mood.
在任务序列中，用祈使语气描述用户界面操作。.
In the WYSIWYG editor, in the drop-down list of attachments, select the newly created attachment that is your image
所见即所得编辑器中，在附件下拉列表中选择最近创建的附件，即是需要的图像
Indent the code cleanly, with open-brace ("{") characters on the same line as the statement that opens the block.
代码缩进要清晰，左花括号("{")应当与开启这个块的语句在同一行。
Initial definition.
初始定义。
Inline code formatting
内联代码格式
Instead, break at natural breaking points.
取而代之的是，在自然中断点处断行。
It is a good idea to use gender-neutral language in any writing where gender is irrelevant to the subject matter, to make the text as inclusive as possible.
在写任何与性别无关的主题时，使用中性语言都是个好主意，能使文字尽可能具有包容性。
It is also used by macros that automate the construction of landing pages inside MDN itself.
同时，在 MDN 内部自动建立着陆页的宏也会用到它。
It presents all the needed fundamentals.
提供了所有必要的基础。
It will be reported as a summary of the article to robots crawling the site, and will then appear in search results for the page.
对于抓取网站的机器人来说，这将做为文章的摘要，随后显示在这个页面相应的搜索结果中。
It's either two subheadings or more or none at all.
要么有两个或更多子标题，要么就根本一个都没。
It's important to be clear about the difference between the terms <s0>obsolete</s0> and <s1>deprecated</s1>.
弄清术语 <s0>过时(obsolete)</s0> 与 <s1>废弃(deprecated)</s1> 之间的区别是非常重要的。
It's sometimes helpful to provide an image in an article you create or modify, especially if the article is very technical.
在一些时候，在文章中提供图像会很有帮助，尤其当文章非常技术性时。
Keyboard keys should use sentence-style capitalization, not all-caps capitalization.
键盘键位应当用句子形式的大小写规则，而非全大写。
Labeling attributes
为属性打上标签
Landing pages
着陆页
Language, grammar, spelling
语言、语法、拼写
Latin
拉丁文
Latin abbreviations
拉丁缩写
Let's take the following example:
看下面这个例子：
Links
链接
Links are a large part of what makes a wiki a powerful learning and teaching tool.
wiki 能成为强大的学习与教学工具，链接是很大一部分原因。
Long lines shouldn't be allowed to stretch off horizontally to the extent that they require horizontal scrolling to read.
不允许长代码行水平延伸到需要水平滚动才能阅读的地步。
MDN allows the use of this very common syntax (which is controversial among usage authorities), to make up for the lack of a neutral gender in English.
MDN 允许使用这种常见语法（使用上是有争议的）来解决英语缺乏中性用法的问题。
MDN is an exception to this rule.
MDN 是此规则的一个例外。
MDN-specific
MDN 专用
Many designers will find the flexbox model easier to use.
许多设计师会发现弹性框模型易于使用。
Margin collapsing
外边距合并(margin collapsing)
Meanings and English equivalents of Latin abbreviations
拉丁文本的含义与等价的英语表达
Method names should be followed by a pair of parentheses: <c0>doSomethingUseful()</c0>.
方法名后面应当跟有一对括号：<c0>doSomethingUseful()</c0>。
Numbers and numerals
数与数词
Obsolete vs. deprecated
过时(obsolete) vs. 废弃(deprecated)
Obsolete:
过时(obsolete)：
On MDN, the term <s0>deprecated</s0> marks an API or technology that is no longer recommended, but is still implemented and may still work.
在 MDN，术语<s0>废弃</s0>表示某 API 或技术不再推荐，但仍然有所实现并可能仍可运作。
On MDN, the term <s0>obsolete</s0> marks an API or technology that is not only no longer recommended, but also no longer implemented in the browser.
在 MDN，术语<s0>过时</s0>表示某 API 或技术不仅不再推荐，同时浏览器中也不再对其进行实现。
On the first mention of a term on a page, expand acronyms likely to be unfamiliar to users.
页面上第一次提到某个术语时，用户可能并不熟悉首字母缩略词的展开形式。
Other languages may have (and are welcome to create) style guides.
其它语言可以拥有（且欢迎创建）自己的样式指南。
Other references
其他参考
Others may or may not work, but are not supported and will probably be removed by editorial staff.
其他 scheme 可能运作也可能不运作，但全都不受支持且有可能被编辑人员移除。
Our writing style tends to be casual, so you should feel free to use contractions (e.g. "don't", "can't", "shouldn't") if you prefer.
我们的写作风格趋于休闲，因此只要你想，可以随意使用缩略（例如"don't", "can't", "shouldn't"）。
Page slugs should be kept short; when creating a new level of hierarchy, the new level's component in the slug should just be a word or two.
页面的缩略名应保持简短；创建新的层级时，该层级在缩略名中应当只有一两个单词。
Page tags
页面标签(tag)
Page titles
页面标题
Page titles and section headings should use sentence-style capitalization (only capitalize the first word and proper nouns) rather than headline-style capitalization:
页面标题与章节标题应当使用一般句子的大小写方式（只有句首单词和专有名词的首字母大写），而非新闻标题式的大小写方式：
Page titles are used in search results and also used to structure the page hierarchy in the breadcrumb list at the top of the page.
在搜索结果中用到页面标题，在页面顶部展现页面层级结构的面包屑到行列中也用到页面标题。
Page titles, on the other hand, may be as long as you like, within reason, and they should be descriptive.
另一方面，页面标题，在合理范围内，长度随意，且应当是描述性的。
Pages with this tag are deleted from time to time.
具有此标签的页面会时不时被删除。
Please do not use variant spellings (e.g., use <e1>color</e1> rather than <e2>colour</e2>).
请勿使用变体拼写法（例如，要用 <e1>color</e1> 而非 <e2>colour</e2>）。
Please.
请别用。
Pluralization
复数形式
Plurals of acronyms and abbreviations
首字母缩略词与缩写的复数形式
Plurals of numerals
数词的复数形式

Positioning child elements is thus much easier, and complex layouts can be achieved more simply and with cleaner code, as the display order of the elements is independent of their order in the source code.
由于元素的显示顺序与它们在源代码中的顺序无关，定位子元素变得更容易，并且能够用更简单清晰的代码来完成复杂的布局。
Preferred dictionary
首选字典
Preferred style guides
首选样式指南
Press OK.
按下确认。
Press enter (or return) to submit the new tag.
按回车即可提交新标签。

标点符号

参考

相关主题

SEO 摘要

在 MDN 上添加删除标签的用户交互的屏幕截图
Sections, paragraphs, and newlines
章节、段落与换行
See the <a3>compatibility table</a3> on each property for up-to-date compatibility status.
最新的兼容性状况可以查看每个具体属性的<a3>兼容性表格</a3>获取。
See {{anch("Creating a page link list")}} for guidelines.
相关原则参见 {{anch("Creating a page link list")}}。
See {{anch("Writing a landing page overview")}} for tips.
更多提示参见{{anch("Writing a landing page overview")}}。
Serial comma
系列逗号
Similarly, the "Warning" style creates warning boxes like this.
类似地，“警告”样式用于创建警告框，就像本条这样。

同样，大部分现代浏览器也会阻止 <c2>javascript:</c2> 及 <c3>jar:</c3> scheme。
So for example, if you are talking about the actions of a specific man, usage of he/his would be fine, but if the subject is a person of either gender, he/his isn't appropriate.<br0>
因此，举个例子说，如果谈论的是具体某位男性的行为，用 he/his 是可以的，但如果主题是任何性别的人，he/his 就不太恰当了。<br0>

下面是一些例子：

部分拉丁缩写很少使用，很多读者不明白其意思。其他的那些也常常会被互相混淆。

特异性(specificity)

循序渐进的讲解如何用此特性来建立布局。

HTML 元素风格参考

标记过时页面
Tagging pages that need work
标记需要进一步工作的页面
Tags provide meta information about a page and/or indicate that a page has specific improvements needed to its content.
标签可以提供页面的有关元数据、表明页面的内容有具体需要改进之处。
Tags will autocomplete as you type.
随着输入，标签会自动补全。
Terminology
术语
Text formatting and styles
文本格式与样式
That said, there is now good support across the board for flexbox.
但，这么说吧，现在全线产品对弹性框都有良好支持。
The "Note" style is used to call out important notes, like this one.
“注解”样式用于表达重要的注解内容，就像本条这样。
The Enter (or Return) key on your keyboard starts a new paragraph.
按回车键开启新段落。
The HyperText Mark-up Language
超文本标记语言(HyperText Mark-up Language)
The SEO summary provides a short description of a page.
SEO 摘要提供页面的简短描述。
The best place to start in any extensive publishing style guide is with some very basic text standards to help keep documentation consistent.
要制定任何大规模的出版物样式指南，都最好从一些用于帮助文档保持一致性的最基本文本标准开始。
The best solution, of course, is to rewrite and eliminate the pronouns:
最佳解决方案，显然，是重写一下，消除代词：
The defining aspect of the flex layout is the ability to alter its items' width and/or height to best fill the available space on any display device.
弹性布局在定义方面是指调整其内项目宽高从而在任何显示设备上实现对可用显示空间最佳填充的能力。
The following example shows text with JavaScript formatting:
以下例子展示了按 Javascript 进行格式化后的文本：
The following sections outline some of these basics to help you.
后继章节将概述这些基本原则。
The heading should use the class "Community".
标题应当用"Community"类
The heading should use the class "Related_Topics".
标题应当用"Related_Topics"类。
The heading should use the class "Tools".
标题应当用"Tools"类。
The landing page should open with a paragraph or two describing the topic or technology, then provide a list of the subpages with descriptions of each page.
着陆页开头应当是一两段对该主题或技术的描述，接下来是带有各个页面描述的子页面列表。
The language aspects of this guide apply primarily to English-language documentation.
本指南中语言方面的内容主要针对英语文档。

The last way of dealing with the problem is arguably better, as it is not only grammatically more correct but removes some of the complexity associated with dealing with genders across different languages that may have wildly varying gender rules.
处理这个问题，最后这种方式无疑更好一些，不仅在语法上更加正确，同时还省却了一些由不同语言间处理性别问题的差异所带来的复杂性。
The left column should be a list of articles, with an
左栏应当是文章列表，顶部是

The left column should be a list of articles, with an <c0><h2></c0> header at the top of the left column explaining that it's a list of articles about the topic (for example "Documentation and tutorials about foo"); this header should use the CSS class "Documentation".
左栏是文章列表，顶部有一个 <c0><h2></c0> 标题，此标题说明了这是一个关于某主题的文章列表（例如“关于 foo 的文档与教程”）；这个标题应当用"Documentation" CSS 类。
The link list section of an MDN landing page consists of two columns.
MDN 着陆页的链接列表区段由两栏组成。

The page title (which is displayed at the top of the page and in the search results) can be different from the page "slug," which is the portion of the page's URL following "<e0><locale&rt;/docs/</e0>".
页面标题（显示于页面顶部和搜索结果中）可以与页面的“缩略名(slug)”不同。缩略名出现于URL中，即跟随在“<e0><locale&rt;/docs/</e0>”后面的哪个部分。
The page title (which is displayed at the top of the page and in the search results) can be different from the page "slug," which is the portion of the page's URL following "<e0><locale>/docs/</e0>".
页面标题（显示于页面顶部和搜索结果中）可以与页面的“缩略名(slug)”不同。缩略名出现于URL中，即跟随在“<e0><locale>/docs/</e0>”后面的那个部分。
The parentheses help differentiate methods from other code terms.
括号可以帮助将方法与其他代码术语区分开来。
The right column should contain one or more of the following sections, in order:
右栏应当包含以下区段中的一个或多个，按顺序分别是：
The serial (also known as "Oxford") comma is the comma that appears before the conjunction in a series of three or more items.
系列逗号（又称“牛津逗号”）是指在三个或更多个项目并列结构中，出现在连词前的逗号。
The spelling checker for this site uses American English.
此网站的拼写检查使用的是美式英语。
The stacking context
堆叠的上下文
The tagging interface lives at the bottom of a page while you're in edit mode, and looks something like this:
在编辑模式中，标签界面出现在页面底部，大致上看起来是这样：

将第三人复数用作中性代词（即，用 "they," them", "their" 和 "theirs"）是种可接受的实践方法，通常称之为"<a0>singular 'they.'</a0>"
Then, with the text entry cursor inside the code box, select the appropriate language from the language list button to the right of the "pre" button, as seen in the screenshot to the right.
然后，保持文本输入光标停留在代码框中，点击"pre"按钮右边的语言列表按钮，选择恰当的语言，如右边的屏幕截图所示。
There are specific rules to follow when writing about HTML elements.
关于 HTML 元素，有一些具体规则需要遵守。
These are created using the following HTML:
这是用以下 HTML 创建的：
These are guidelines rather than strict rules.</s0> We are more interested in content than formatting, so don't feel obligated to learn the style guide before contributing.
这些内容只是指导原则而非强制规定。</s0>我们关注内容甚于格式，因此并不是非要先学好样式指南才能开始做贡献。
These rules produce consistent descriptions of elements and their components.
这些规则为元素及其组件生成一致的描述。
These should be published as subpages of the localization team's page.
它们应作为本地化团队页面的子页面发布。
These technologies will in theory eventually become <e1>obsolete</e1> and be removed, so you should stop using them.
理论上说，这些技术最终都会变为<e1>过时</e1>并移除，因此应当停止使用它们。
They also ensure correct linking to detailed documentation.
同时，也确保链接到正确的详细文档。
They have a standard format that consists of three areas:
它们的标准格式由三个区域组成：
This independence intentionally affects only the visual rendering, leaving speech order and navigation based on the source order.
这种无关性是特意限制于视觉呈现上的，语音顺序以及基于源代码顺序的导航均不受影响。
This is in contrast to the <a0>One Mozilla style guide</a0>, which specifies that the serial comma is not to be used.
与之相反，<a0>一体化 Mozilla 样式指南</a0>明确指出不要使用系列逗号。
This results in:
其结果是：
This should provide information on IRC channels and mailing lists available on the topic.
这里要提供关于此主题可用的 IRC 频道和邮件列表信息。
This solution can make translation easier for both readers and localizers.
这种解决方式使得无论是对读者还是对本地化人员而言，翻译都更加轻松。
Title and heading capitalization
标题的大小写
To add a tag, click in the edit box at the end of the tag list and type the tag name you wish to add.
要添加标签，点击位于标签列表末尾的编辑框并输入想要添加的标签名称。
To automatically create a link to a Bugzilla bug, use this macro:
用这个宏自动建立通向某个 Bugzilla bug 的链接：
To fix this, use gender-neutral pronouns:
要解决这个问题，使用中性代词：
To include an image:
若要包含图像：
To insert a newline without a space, hold down the Shift key while pressing Enter.
如果要另起一行又不想中间有空白，按住 Shift 键同时按回车。
To remove a tag, just click the little "X" icon in the tag.
要移除标签，只要点击标签上小小的"X"图标即可。
Tools
工具
Try to avoid putting your article at the top of the hierarchy, which slows the site down and makes search and site navigation less effective.
避免将文章放在层级结构的顶层，这样会拖慢站点的速度，并且使搜索和站点导航的效果变差。
Try to be consistent, though.
但是要尽力保持一致。
Tutorial explaining how to use flexbox in the specific context of Web applications.
讲解在 Web 应用的特定环境下如何应用弹性框。
URL schemes
URL scheme（URL 方案）
Unless specifically instructed to do so, <s0>do not</s0> use the HTML <c1>style</c1> attribute to manually style content.
除非有明确的指示，否则<s0>不要</s0>使用 HTML 的<c1>style</c1> 属性来手工指定内容样式。
Use "Code (inline)" style, and do not use quotation marks around strings, unless needed by the syntax of a code sample.
用“代码（内联）”样式，同时，除非示例代码中的语法确实需要，字符串两边不要有引号。
Use "elements" to refer to HTML and XML elements, rather than "tags".
用“元素”来指代 HTML 与 XML 元素，而非“标签”。
Use <s0>bold face</s0>.
Use English-style plurals, not the Latin- or Greek-influenced forms.
使用英语风格的复数，而不是拉丁式的或希腊文影响的形式。
Use full capitals and delete periods in all acronyms and abbreviations, including organizations such as "US" and "UN".
首字母缩略词与缩写都要全大写并删除其中的句点，包括诸如"US"和"UN"这样的组织名称。
Use heading levels in decreasing order: {{HTMLElement("h2")}} then {{HTMLElement("h3")}} then {{HTMLElement("h4")}}, without skipping levels.
按递减顺序使用各个标题级别：首先 {{HTMLElement("h2")}}，其次 {{HTMLElement("h3")}}，再次 {{HTMLElement("h4")}}，不要跳过级别。
Use labels like {{HTMLVersionInline(5)}} thoughtfully.
使用诸如 {{HTMLVersionInline(5)}} 这样的标签时需要仔细考量。
Use periods in these abbreviations.
在这些缩写中，要用句点（.）。
Use standard English capitalization rules in body text, and capitalize "World Wide Web" and "Web".
在正文中，使用标准的英语大小写规则，同时首字母大写"World Wide Web"和"Web"。
Use the "Code" button (labeled with two angle brackets "<>") to apply inline code-style formatting to function names, variable names, and method names (this uses the {{HTMLElement("code")}} element).
用“代码”按钮（标记是两个尖括号"<>"）来把内联代码样式应用到函数名、变量名、方法名上（这其实是用了{{HTMLElement("code")}} 元素）。
Use the "Formatting Styles" drop-down list to apply predefined styles to selected content.
用“格式样式”下拉菜单可以把预定义的样式应用到选定内容上。
Use the following tags for pages that are not current:
对于并非当前状态的页面，用以下标签：
Use the {{TemplateLink("HTMLElement")}} macro, which creates a link to the page for that element.
用 {{TemplateLink("HTMLElement")}} 宏，这将建立通向此元素相应页面的链接。

Use the {{TemplateLink("htmlattrdef")}} macro (e.g., <s0>\{{htmlattrdef("type")}}</s0>) for the definition term, so that it can be linked to from other pages, then use the {{TemplateLink("htmlattrxref")}} macro (e.g., <s1>\{{htmlattrxref("attr","element")}}</s1>) to reference attribute definitions.
对定义的术语用 {{TemplateLink("htmlattrdef")}} 宏（例如，<s0>\{{htmlattrdef("type")}}</s0>），这样它能够链接到其他网页，接着对参考属性定义用 {{TemplateLink("htmlattrxref")}} 宏（例如，<s1>\{{htmlattrxref("attr","element")}}</s1>）。
Use two spaces per tab in all code examples.
在所有代码样本中，都按每个制表符两个空格的标准用空格缩进。
User interface actions
用户界面操作
Using CSS flexible boxes
使用 CSS 弹性框
Using flexbox to lay out Web applications
用弹性框进行 Web 应用布局
Using, inserting images
使用、插入图像
Voice
语态
We have many older pages that were written before this style rule was established.
有不少页面是在本样式规则确立之前编写的。

We will be expanding the guide over time, so if you have specific questions that aren't covered in this document, please send them to the <a0>MDC mailing list</a0> or <a1>project lead</a1> so we know what should be added.
随着时间推移，我们会逐渐扩展此指南。所以如果你有任何此文档未包含的具体问题，请发给<a0> MDC 邮件列表</a0>或<a1>项目负责人</a1>，好让我们知道应当添加哪些内容。
We're gradually getting to them.
我们正在逐步处理。
When in doubt, expand it, or, better, link it to the article or <a0>glossary</a0> entry describing the technology.
如果不确定，请将其展开，或者，更好的办法是，链接到描述此技术的文章或<a0>词汇表</a0>条目。
When you need to add some articles about a topic or subject area, you will typically do so by creating a landing page, then adding subpages for each of the individual articles.
如果需要针对某个话题或主题领域添加若干文章，典型的做法是建立一个着陆页(landing page)，然后分别为每篇文章添加子页面。
While the active voice is preferred, the passive voice is also acceptable, given the informal feel of our content.
首选主动语态，但用被动语态也可以，因为我们的内容有非正式的感觉。
Wiki markup and usage
wiki 标记与用法
You can also use the <s1>{{TemplateLink("obsolete_header")}}</s1> macro to put a prominent banner on the topic.
还可以用 <s1>{{TemplateLink("obsolete_header")}}</s1> 宏来为主题放上一个突出的banner提示。
You can automate the insertion of pages into the list using some macros we've created.
我们已经建好一些宏，通过它们可以自动将页面插入列表中。
You can find details on tagging in our <a0>How to properly tag pages</a0> guide.
关于打标签的细节信息，参见<a0>如何正确为页面打标签</a0>指南。
You can use both genders:
也可以同时使用两种性别：
and others
and others 以及其他
and so forth, and so on
and so forth, and so on 等等 / 及其他
block and a brief one-or-two sentence summary of the article in the corresponding
块中，文章的一两句简短摘要则出现在相应的
block.
块中。
compare
compare 对比
en-US/docs/SVG
en-US/docs/SVG
en-US/docs/XHTML
en-US/docs/XHTML
en-US/docs/XML
en-US/docs/XML
for example
for example 例如

header at the top of the left column explaining that it's a list of articles about the topic (for example "Documentation and tutorials about foo"); this header should use the CSS class "Documentation".
标题，此标题说明了这是一个关于某主题的文章列表（例如“关于 foo 的文档与教程”）；这个标题应当用"Documentation" CSS 类。
inheritance
继承(inheritance)
list of articles with each article's link in a
列表，每篇文章的链接在
making the users plural:
或者将用户也使用复数：
note well
note well 注意
postscript
postscript 附言 / 再者
that is, in other words
that is, in other words 换言之
{{CSSRef}}
{{CSSRef}}
